settings.heading: Features
settings.content:
• Self Cleaning- Eliminates bacteria, viruses, dust mites, microorganisms, and dust particles. Advanced sterilization system (134°F high temperature) removes viruses, bacteria, dust, pollen to deliver clean air. 
  • Micro-Vent Soft Airflow- Thousands of precision micro vents designed to produce gentle draft free breeze for optimum comfort. (Excluding 36,000K BTU)
  • Outdoor unit operation- -22°F-125°F
  • Wide Voltage Fluctuation- System can tolerate 165-265V fluctuation in unstable environment 
  • Wifi-Control- Built in wifi module 
  • Fast heating & cooling technology- Thanks to our Inverter compressor, your desired room temperature can be quickly obtained. 
  • Offline Voice control- Same room voice command abilities. (Excluding 36,000K BTU)
  • Eco-Energy Saving Mode- Designed to help save power and energy 
  • Easy Installation- Comes with: installation guide, installation plate, and built in level
  • Gold Fin- In both the outdoor and indoor unit to reduce corrosion and oxidation over blue finned models. 
  • Vertical placement PCB- Prevents depositioning and deformation to deduce damage rates. UV adhesive cover to help reduce corrosion to lower failure rates and lower maintenance needs. 
  • Base pan heating- Automatically turning on in low temperatures in the base of the outdoor unit to improve efficiency and reduce freezing.

settings.heading: GWIN Warranty
settings.content:
GWIN comes with 12 year parts and 12 year compressor warranties free, no matter who installed it. There's no tiered installer program like other manufacturers. Everyone gets the best warranty we have, for free.

GWIN also comes with a free 7 year warranty on labor and refrigerant. There's no need to buy a warranty for the labor yourself. If you install a GWIN and there's a problem within the warranty period, we'll pay the labor costs to fix it (limitations apply).

***Some features maybe available on the Wall Mount Air Handlers Only***

settings.heading: Features
settings.content:
Notable Features Include:

  • High Performance: Consistent indoor comfort, even during extreme outdoor temperatures.
  • Wide Voltage Range: Operates from 170V–253V to handle power fluctuations and protect the PCB. 
  • Long Piping Design: Install up to 98 ft horizontally and 49 ft vertically for layout flexibility.
  • Auto-Restart: System automatically resumes previous settings after a power outage.
  • Refrigerant Cooling Technology: Prevents PCB overheating for longer system life.
  • Dual Communication: Compatible with 24V and 485 control systems, easily integrates with most setups.
  • Flexible Mounting Options: Vertical, horizontal, or inverted installation for any space type.
  • ESP Range: Rated at 0.5 in.W.C, with a max of 1.0 in.W.C for optimal air pressure control.

settings.subheading: GWIN High Wall Mount Air Handlers
settings.heading: Hassle-Free Installation
settings.text: GWIN systems are designed for easy installation, often requiring minimal modifications to your home.

settings.subheading: GWIN High Wall Mount Air Handlers
settings.heading: Ease-of-Access
settings.text: Vertical PCB Boards can be directly extracted, prevent deposition or deformation, and reduce damage rates to give you peace of mind.

settings.heading: Refrigerant Cooling Technology
settings.text: Efficient thermal operation prevents GWIN units from overheating, allowing for more consistent operation and reducing maintenance requirements by 50%.

settings.subheading: GWIN High Wall Mount Air Handlers
settings.heading: Energy-Saving Efficiency
settings.text: GWIN units range from SEER20 to SEER25, providing better efficiency and comfort.

settings.heading: Auto-Restart Function
settings.text: In cases of power loss, due to unreliable and unpredictable power grid issues, GWIN systems pick up the settings where it lost power. No manual restart necessary!

settings.subheading: GWIN High Wall Mount Air Handler
settings.heading: Automatic Self-Cleaning
settings.text: GWIN indoor units wash particulates from their coils - providing fresh, clean, and healthy air.

settings.heading: Base Pan Heating
settings.text: A heater in the base pan automatically turns on in low temperatures to reduce freezing & improve efficiency.

settings.heading: Golden Fin Technology
settings.text: Gold-finned indoor and outdoor units helps to reduce corrosion and oxidation over conventional, blue-finned models.

settings.heading: Flexible Power
settings.text: Designed to operate normally under voltage fluctuations between 165V and 265V.

settings.subheading: GWIN High Wall Mount Air Handlers
settings.heading: Fast Cooling
settings.text: Enjoy comfort right away, provided by high-frequency start-up and strong cooling capacity.

settings.subheading: GWIN systems are designed for easy installation, often requiring minimal modifications to your home

settings.heading: The creative minds behind our studio

settings.text: As designers we are constantly thinking about how people live and what problems we could solve for them.

settings.heading: Testimonials
settings.text: "GWIN is great for areas that have fluctuating power surges. It can withstand voltages between 165V and 265V saving me thousands when power surges occur!"
settings.author: Jenny W.

settings.heading: Testimonials
settings.text: “UNTOUCHABLE and UNBEATABLE warranties! Customer Support is really helpful with all the parts ON HAND needed for GWIN.”
settings.author: Samantha T.

settings.heading: Testimonials
settings.text: “OMG, my system speaks to me and I can give it commands. So cool!”
settings.author: Luis G.

settings.heading: Testimonials
settings.text: “The auto cleaning feature is ridiculously cool. Now I only deep clean every 6 months! I love breathing in fresh air every day without the constantly weekly hassle of cleaning my system.”
settings.author: David Martinez

settings.title: DIY
settings.text:
DIY Program that enables you to install your system and we will find someone to charge your line set!

*Electrical should be installed by a licensed electrician. Line set should be charged by a licensed hvac technician or EPA license technician.
